Content: 1. Start by analyzing your current Instagram feed to identify the types of content that receive the most engagement, such as behind-the-scenes pictures, how-to videos, or customer testimonials. This will help you understand what your audience is looking for. 2. Utilize the tool 'Answer the Public' to generate a list of questions related to your niche that people are searching for online. This can provide endless content ideas based on commonly asked questions. 3. Keep an eye on upcoming events and holidays to create timely and relevant content. Tailor your posts to specific events or holidays, such as national ice cream day or national strawberry day, to engage your audience and stay top of mind.
